message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I believe it holds significant value and would be a great asset to you.  To kick things off, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $17,000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering its value to me.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. While $17,000 is a fair offer, I'm aiming for a slightly higher price point. Would you consider $18,500?  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.

I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $18,000 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value it will bring to me.
